alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Cameron; Hidalgo; Jim Hogg; Kenedy; Starr; Willacy; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued June 17 at 11:05PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THIS IS A CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK. THE MISSOURI CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR ROYAL DIXON, BLACK, MALE, 4 YEARS OLD, HEIGHT 3 FEET 7 INCHES, 45LBS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING YELLOW CHECKERED SHIRT AND BLACK CARGO PANTS; HE HAD THREE PONYTAILS IN HIS HAIR. AS WELL AS, KENNEDY BREELOVE, BLACK, FEMALE, 6 YEARS OLD, HEIGHT 3 FEET 10 INCHES, 50LBS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING WHITE FLOWER PATTERN SHIRT WITH THE WORD u201cLOVEu201d ON THE FRONT, WHITE SWEATPANTS, AND NO SHOES. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR BRIANNA CANNON, 25 YEARS OLD, BLACK, FEMALE, HEIGHT 5 FEET 6 INCHES, 179LBS, RED HAIR, BROWN EYES AND LAST SEEN WEARING BLACK SHIRT, BLACK SHORTS, AND RED SHOES, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A BLACK, UNKNOWN YEAR JEEP, BEARING UNKNOWN LICENSE PLATE. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN THE 4400 BLOCK OF SIERRA POINT DR, FRESNO, TX. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THESE CHILDREN TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE MISSOURI CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 2 8 1 4 0 3 8 7 0 0. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS MISSOURI CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 2 8 1 4 0 3 8 7 0 0.
